title: Equations of motion for circular motion

content.question: If a particle moves in a plane so that its position is described by the functions ğ‘¥ = ğ´ cos ğœ”t and ğ‘¦ = ğ´ sin ğœ”t , the particle is

choices.label: moving with constant speed along a circle
moving with varying speed along a circle
moving with constant acceleration along a straight line

content.answer: moving with constant speed along a circle

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
